articles.title: NIP goes under MoH, Mosti to focus on vaccine development - New Straits Times
articles.description: BERA: Only the Health Ministry (MoH) will handle the country’s Covid-19 National Immunisation programme (NIP) from now on, whereas the Science, Technology and Innovation Ministry (Mosti) will focus on vaccine research and development (R&D).
